content: **knitted baby hat with cables sizes 0 months 4 years the piece is worked in drops puna ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no pu-001-by yarn group b ----------------------------------------------------------- sizes 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years fits head size approx 34/38 - 40/42 - 42/44 - 44/46 48/50 - 50/52 cm materials drops puna from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50-50-50-50 50-50 g colour 02 beige the piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group b see link below drops double pointed needles size 4 mm or the size needed to get 21 stitches and 28 row stocking stitch on 10 cm in width and 10 cm in height drops cable needle for cables ----------------------------------------------------------
